justification: “After the iUG each player completed two self-reports instruments measuring components of personality—the Action Control Scale (ACS-90…)” indicates that the ACS-90 was the instrument used to assess action control / action-state orientation.
The same sentence notes the “Interpersonal Reactivity Index (Davis, 1983)” as the second self-report instrument, showing it was employed to measure empathic/interpersonal reactivity traits.

measured_by: reciprocity model parameter α (adapted Cox et al., 2007 model)
justification: Later results state, “The model produced a reciprocity parameter, α, for each Proposer and Responder,” demonstrating that the α parameter derived from the adapted reciprocity model served as the quantitative measure of each player’s reciprocity.
